description:
As a puppy lover
I want to adopt a puppy
So they can chew my furniture
name: Adopting a puppy

elements.name: Adopting one puppy from the website

steps.name: I am on the puppy adoption site "http://localhost:3000"
I click the View Details button for "Brook"
I click the Adopt Me! button
I click the Complete the Adoption button
I complete the adoption using this information "Mr. Cheezy", "123 Main Street", "cheezy@mail.com", "Check"
I should see "Thank you for adopting a puppy!"

arguments.val: Thank you for adopting a puppy!

description:
As a puppy lover
I want to change my mind after adopting a puppy
So I can choose another puppy.
name: Change mind after adopting a puppy

elements.name: Changing mind after adopting a puppy before pay

steps.name: I am on the puppy adoption site "http://localhost:3000"
I click the View Details button for "Brook"
I click the Adopt Me! button
I click the Change your mind button and accept OK
I should be back on the home page

description:
As a site administrator
I want to see errors displayed properly when invalid payment information is entered
So we can provide better tech support
name: Getting errors when entering invalid payment info

elements.name: Adopting one puppy from the website

steps.name: I am on the puppy adoption site "http://localhost:3000"
I click the View Details button for "Brook"
I click the Adopt Me! button
I click the Complete the Adoption button
I complete the adoption using no information
I should see this error message "5 errors prohibited this order from being saved:"

arguments.val: 5 errors prohibited this order from being saved:
